artist: Artist: Douglas Padilla; Artist: Packaged by Alexa Horochowski
creditline: Gift of the Weiser Family Foundation
description: Packaged rectangular "collage" on corrugated cardboard; pink ground with black and white smears; black border with orange and white spots; packaged in plastic bag with cardboard hanging label stapled to top
dimension: 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 3/16 in. (21.59 x 11.43 x 0.48 cm) (including package)
signed: on back, in black: Padilla / 2001 (on top of a pink dog)
title: Abstract Expressionism, from Trinket Carro/Chuchería Cart
